faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Study Hacks
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our support team - we're here to help!
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team

items.question: What exactly is Study Hacks and how does it work?
items.answer: Study Hacks is an AI-powered learning platform that transforms your study materials into interactive, personalized learning experiences. Upload PDFs, videos, lectures, or any content, and our AI generates comprehensive notes, flashcards, quizzes, and study guides tailored to your learning style.

items.question: What types of files can I upload to Study Hacks?
items.answer: Study Hacks supports a wide range of file formats including PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, video files (MP4, AVI), audio recordings (MP3, WAV), lecture recordings, YouTube links, and even handwritten notes that you can scan.

items.question: How does Study Hacks improve my learning and grades?
items.answer: Study Hacks uses proven learning science techniques like spaced repetition, active recall, and personalized learning paths. Our AI identifies your knowledge gaps, creates custom study schedules, and adapts to your learning style, which helps improve retention and boost grades by an average of 30%.

items.question: Is Study Hacks suitable for my specific subject or field?
items.answer: Absolutely! Study Hacks works for all subjects and academic levels - from high school to graduate school. Whether you're studying medicine, law, engineering, humanities, or any other field, our AI adapts to your specific subject matter and learning needs.

items.question: Can I collaborate with classmates using Study Hacks?
items.answer: Yes! Study Hacks includes powerful collaboration features where you can share notes, create group study sessions, build collaborative flashcard sets, and even compete in study quizzes. Perfect for study groups and team learning projects.

items.question: How much does Study Hacks cost and is there a free trial?
items.answer: Study Hacks offers a free tier with basic features so you can try it risk-free. Premium plans start at $9.99/month with unlimited uploads, advanced AI features, and collaboration tools. We also offer student discounts and special rates for educational institutions.
